page.title: 14The River Ure
page.content: My dad owns a marina which is called Tower Marine.It is a small private place where you can buy or sell boats. The marina can run out to the river or out to the canal.The river used to be used for transport when there were no cars but is now used for pleasure.My grandad helps my dad in the shop so it's really a family buisness.Potters sand and gravel firm have a barge to dredge the river for sand.The river Ure runs from the Yorkshire Dales through Boroughbridge down to the river Ouse and into York.The pollution from the engines kills all the fish and lead weights from fishing are swallowed by swans and that kills them.The river is used for different uses and we should help to look after it.
